content:
/>
VII.i.1.B.2.a
.
System Establishment of EP 330 Upon Receipt of VA Form 21-0538
Effective September 19, 2020, the intake of
VA Form 21-0538
via the Centralized Mail process described in
M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, 1.A.1
, triggers the automatic establishment of end product (EP) 330,
Dependency Verification Review.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Verification of Marital Status and the Status of Dependents
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
